tests.data_manager.batch_factory.data_reader_factory package

tests.data_manager.batch_factory.data_reader_factory.scenarios module

tests.data_manager.batch_factory.data_reader_factory.test_data_reader_factory module

Tests for DataReaderFactory.

For any Data Reader a valid dataset must be provided.

Test cases: 1) Both dataset and regime configs are valid -> DataReader 2) Dataset config is invalid: incorrect name of the data reader -> NotImplementedError 3) Regime config is invalid: incorrect name of the regime -> ValueError

tests.data_manager.batch_factory.data_reader_factory.test_data_reader_factory.test_get_reader(dataset_config: DatasetConfig, regime_config: DataRegimeConfig, reference_reader: type[DataReader])[source]
